Data Operations¶

Data operations classes:

DataParser: Class to parse input csv file and create pandas dataframe, and extract features and data

DataframeUtilities: Class of basic utilities for dataframe manipulation, and exchanging between dataframes and numpy arrays.

Code¶

class DataOperations.DataParser(configdict=None)[source]¶

Class to parse input csv file and create pandas dataframe, and extract features and data

Parameters:configdict (dict) – MASTML configfile object as dict
parse_fromfile()¶

parses data and features from input file

Parameters:
  • datapath (str) – path of location of input data csv file
  • as_array (bool) – whether to return data in form of numpy array
Returns:

feature data matrix pandas dataframe or numpy array : target data vector list : list of x feature names str : target feature name pandas dataframe : dataframe containing data and feature names
Return type:

pandas dataframe or numpy array
parse_fromdataframe()¶

parses data and features from pandas dataframe

Parameters:
  • dataframe (pandas dataframe) – dataframe containing data and feature names
  • target_feature (str) – target feature name
  • as_array (bool) – whether to return data in form of numpy array
Returns:

feature data matrix pandas dataframe or numpy array : target data vector list : list of x feature names str : target feature name pandas dataframe : dataframe containing data and feature names
Return type:

pandas dataframe or numpy array
import_data()¶

reads in csv file from supplied data path

Parameters:datapath (str) – string of path to csv file
Returns:dataframe representation of csv contents
Return type:pandas dataframe
get_features()¶

obtains x and y features of input data based on user-supplied input file

Parameters:
  • dataframe (pandas dataframe) – dataframe representation of csv contents
  • target_feature (str) – target feature name
  • from_input_file (bool) – whether to read-in data from input file path. If False, reads from dataframe
Returns:

list of x feature names str : target feature name
Return type:

list
get_data()¶

obtains X and y data from dataframe

Parameters:
  • dataframe (pandas dataframe) – a pandas dataframe object containg X and y data to read in
  • x_features (list) – list of x feature names
  • y_feature (str) – target feature name
Returns:

dataframe of x data only pandas dataframe : dataframe of y data only
Return type:

pandas dataframe
class DataOperations.DataframeUtilities[source]¶

Class of basic utilities for dataframe manipulation, and exchanging between dataframes and numpy arrays

merge_dataframe_columns()¶

merge two dataframes by concatenating the column names (duplicate columns omitted)

Parameters:
  • dataframe1 (pandas dataframe) – a pandas dataframe object
  • dataframe2 (pandas dataframe) – a pandas dataframe object
Returns:

merged dataframe
Return type:

pandas dataframe
merge_dataframe_rows()¶

merge two dataframes by concatenating the row contents (duplicate rows omitted)

Parameters:
  • dataframe1 (pandas dataframe) – a pandas dataframe object
  • dataframe2 (pandas dataframe) – a pandas dataframe object
Returns:

merged dataframe
Return type:

pandas dataframe
get_dataframe_statistics()¶

obtain basic statistics about data contained in the dataframe

Parameters:dataframe (pandas dataframe) – a pandas dataframe object
Returns:dataframe containing input dataframe statistics
Return type:pandas dataframe
dataframe_to_array()¶

transform a pandas dataframe to a numpy array

Parameters:dataframe (pandas dataframe) – a pandas dataframe object
Returns:a numpy array representation of the inputted dataframe
Return type:numpy array
array_to_dataframe()¶

transform a numpy array to a pandas dataframe

Parameters:array (numpy array) – a numpy array object
Returns:a pandas dataframe representation of the inputted numpy array
Return type:pandas dataframe
concatenate_arrays()¶

merge two numpy arrays by concatenating along the columns

Parameters:
  • Xarray (numpy array) – a numpy array object
  • yarray (numpy array) – a numpy array object
Returns:

a numpy array merging the two input arrays
Return type:

numpy array
assign_columns_as_features()¶

adds column names to dataframe based on the x and y feature names

Parameters:
  • dataframe (pandas dataframe) – a pandas dataframe object
  • x_features (list) – list containing x feature names
  • y_feature (str) – target feature name
Returns:

dataframe containing same data as input, with columns labeled with features
Return type:

pandas dataframe
save_all_dataframe_statistics()¶

obtain dataframe statistics and save it to a csv file

Parameters:
  • dataframe (pandas dataframe) – a pandas dataframe object
  • data_path (str) – file path to save dataframe statistics to
Returns:

name of file dataframe stats saved to
Return type:

str
plot_dataframe_histogram()¶

creates a histogram plot of target feature data and saves it to designated save path

Parameters:
  • configdict (dict) – MASTML configfile object as dict
  • dataframe (pandas dataframe) – a pandas dataframe object
  • y_feature (str) – target feature name
Returns:

name of file dataframe histogram saved to
Return type:

str
